Text: holy crap! What a piss take of American bullshit!

Next time you create a torrent posting on this web site, I hope you will be smart enough to create a better listing title than "pirate_bay_torrent".

Most folks using this web site are not mind readers.
It is therefore very useful to create torrent posting titles that properly describe what the torrent contains.
